transcription: My name is Earnhardt, Jeffrey Earnhardt, and I'm born to win. People are asking me why. Why am I always pushing my limits to the edge? Since my childhood, I knew what my goal in life was. My goal was to be first. I was born and raised on these tracks. My great-grandfather, he set the tracks and then my grandfather came right after him and was seven-time champion because he was  It's just that awesome, you know, and that's all part of the legacy that just made it more of my destiny to continue. And every day of my life, I have a combat, one that makes me sweat and one that makes me rewarded. My goal's in life, and that's where I want to be. I want to be a champion. I live for performance, and I'm made to play outside. I have to surround myself with elements that give me confidence, physically and mentally.  I earned it, and I know what it takes to be at the top of the game. Racing is everything to me. It's the only thing I love. It's in my blood, and it's in my family genetics. And today, I can say I'm a champion. What is your combat? Find the Kappa Combat Collection at your nearest participating BRP K&M  I'm Diller.
